The Bull ReportApril 27th, 2007
News updates on MortgageBrokers.com
MortgageBrokers.com Signs Exclusive Revenue Licensing Agreement with Four Mortgage Brokerages Worth an Estimated CAD$120 Million in Additional Mortgage Origination

TORONTO--(BUSINESS WIRE)--MortgageBrokers.com Inc., a subsidiary of MortgageBrokers.com Holdings Inc. (OTC BB: MBKR - News
) announced today that in February and March of 2007 the Company signed licensing agreements with four mortgage broker companies by which these entities will now operate under the MortgageBrokers.com brand exclusively. The companies, Sage Financial Services of Truro, Nova Scotia, Edwards Randall Financial Architects of Halifax, Nova Scotia, Abbey Road Mortgage Brokers, Inc., of St. John, New Brunswick, and Your Lending Partner, Inc. of St. Johns Newfoundland are estimated to generate a combined annual mortgage volume of up to CAD$120 Million. This figure is based on the individual financial history of each entity and the current financial trends affecting the markets in which
 they operate. All of these companies will operate under the MortgageBrokers.com brand and will share a percentage of their net profits with the Company.

Read the fulll release
About MortgageBrokers.comMortgageBrokers.com is an online lead generator and mortgage brand specializing in the mortgage brokerage sector. The Company is dedicated to re- branding the over 40,000 small and medium mortgage broker (SME) firms in North America while providing these entities scalability through a centralized, shared services platform. MortgageBrokers.com is designed to facilitate continued owners ship of these SME brokers while they work under the umbrella of one globally recognized brand.
